title: Have we got an approximate landing time/date for the new champ select? It's been a few days now.
body: Just wondering how much more time we have to wait until we get the new champ select.

replies.body: 72 hours ends today so my guess is in the next few days.

Expect it tomorrow or the next day. Here's Riot's official post about this [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/Mc1nPqMw-new-champion-select-coming-to-ranked-soon).

And just to confirm, 72 hours is not completely correct. The official post by Sephyre said:

> Champ select will be live on NA and TR for Ranked for a 72-hour testing cycle beginning on the 14th. If that goes well it will then be rolled **_one_** at a time to the other regions including OCE.

Since they did say one at a time, it could mean we wont get it for 1 - 3 days after that 72 hour period. 

(You wont find the exact reply I quoted above BTW, because there's been a glitch and it's missing now. I know it existed though, because I was the one Sephyre was replying to.)
I read 72 hours somewhere (from initial launch). Wish we had an update though.
